data.name: Shooty Skies X-2 Revenant After Years Wings Reborn Tactics S Type-0 - Advance Pack
data.detailed_description:
Boost your pilot collection with this set of pilots, plus added extras for FREE!

Please note: if you already own a pilot from this set, you will be rewarded with a duplicate consolation prize. So feel free to use this pack to fill out any holes in your pilot lineup!

This DLC Pack contains:

1500 Coins
3000 Gold Tickets
Sir Oinks-A-Lot (permanently doubles coins dropped in-game)
45 Pilots
  • Snaps
  • Melanie
  • Coolthulu
  • Meow Z
  • C-1000
  • Blobby
  • Captain Panda
  • 3.1
  • Ghost Smoosher
  • Dante
  • Infotainer
  • Shooty Feet
  • Ho-Ho-Hobot

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7 +
  • Processor: 64bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: 64bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 970 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.9
  • Processor: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.13
  • Processor: Discreet Nvidia or AMD GPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: 64bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: 64bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 970 4GB VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
